name: Dustin Hoffman Movies Multiple Choice Quiz | Dustin Hoffman | 10 Questions

questions.text: Hoffman played the husband in 'Kramer vs. Kramer'. Who played the wife?
In 'Little Big Man', Hoffman plays a survivor of what event?
Which member of 'Saturday Night Live' appeared with Hoffman in 'Tootsie'?
Where was the prison in 'Papillon' located?
questions.explanation:
Devil's Island.

	With Steve McQueen in the title role.

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT a movie with Hoffman in the cast?
questions.explanation:
'The Ruling Class'.

	I think that was Peter O'Toole.

questions.text: In 'Rain Man', what is Hoffman's problem?
questions.explanation:
Raymond (Hoffman) has autism.

	His brother, played by Tom Cruise, has to learn how to get along with Raymond.

questions.text: Which of the following did NOT appear in 'The Graduate'?
questions.explanation:
Beau Bridges.

	Daniels played Hoffman's father. Fell was a landlord (in a small {role);} Dreyfuss had an even smaller role.

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT a movie with Hoffman in the cast?
Who provided the theme song for 'Midnight Cowboy'?
Hoffman starred in the Broadway version of this stage classic. (It is available on video.)
questions.explanation:
'Death of a Salesman'.

	Nice job with a tough role.
